about_the_game:
In this dystopian future world, players take on the role of OMICRONIX Corp Recovery technicians sent out to derelict space stations to resolve the interdimensional catastrophes caused by the Faster-Than-Light Crimson Engine drives.

Threatened by otherworldly malevolent forces, players must work together to survive the horrors stalking them as they seek to sever this interdimensional rift and disable the Crimson Drive Cores once and for all.

You've Been Hired to the Recovery Corps!

    ⠀⠀⠀⠀
  • Session-based Multiplayer PvE
    Join up with up to 3 of your friends to board deadly derelict space craft, disable and retrieve the craft's Crimson Core, and make it out alive!
    ⠀⠀⠀⠀
  • Follow OCIX Procedure
    Find and Close Crimson Rips | Expand Your Toolset | Extract The Crimson Core | Get OUT Alive!

  • Stay Alert, Stay Alive
    Keep your head on a swivel and use all of the tools at your disposal - including those scavenged as you explore - to stay alert to danger as you navigate each derelict space station in search of Crimson Rips to close and the Crimson Drive Core to bring back to your docked dropship, the POD.
    ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Backstory


50 years have passed since the megacorporation OMICRONIX discovered a new technology that could send ships to distant stars in an instant. This FTL Engine was called The Crimson Drive. For decades, OMICRONIX recruited the hopeful and the destitute, launching them into the darkest parts of space to mine asteroids and distant planets.

One By One they All Went Dark.

Powered by unexplained and misunderstood forces, extended operation of the Crimson Drives shattered the boundaries of our dimension, creating a gateway to horror on each ship that used it. The things that crossed over have infested the now-derelict crafts, melding them into nests and hives. While the former crew members and their families are now gone, the dangers of these rifts still remain.

Desperate to reclaim the data recorded during these events, OMICRONIX now tasks their downtrodden workforce with returning to these craft, shutting down the dimensional rifts, and returning with the drive’s Crimson Cores for study.

It’s not easy, and it’s not safe. But someone has to do it…

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes significant elements of sci-fi horror including monstrous creatures of alien and/or supernatural nature, jump scares and psychological horror, monsters that can and can not be defeated with combat, and overall stressful engagements with threats within the game.

detailed_description:
Early Access

As of 1/16/2025 This game’s development has been suspended indefinitely

After 11 content, gameplay improvement, and performance improvement updates, we have exhausted our financial runway and sales are insufficient to support the cost of operation for the studio, so the game’s development has been suspended indefinitely.

It has been an exciting but difficult journey full of many surprises (good and bad) and challenges leading us to this point. Although we are saddened that INFESTSTATION was never able to grow into the game it was meant to be, I am extremely proud of what we were able to accomplish with it.

We are eternally grateful to everyone who has supported Atom Switch and INFESTSTATION, which will remain available in Early Access (with a heavily reduced price to reflect the situation), in the event that it can one day be revived and completed.

 

More information can be found in the most recent update post on this store page.


Join Us On Discord


Join us on the Atom Switch Community Discord Server! Check out the sidebar for the link.

name: InfestStation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHZ or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or better (May Lower In Future Updates!)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance needs are resolution dependent, higher display resolutions have an outsized impact on performance needs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHZ or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070 or better, AMD RX-6900XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance needs are resolution dependent, higher display resolutions have an outsized impact on performance needs

short_description: INFESTSTATION is a multiplayer Sci-Fi horror game. Board danger-filled abandoned space craft, work together to complete objectives, and sever the dimensional gateways that have allowed horrifying threats to take over and infest these now derelict spaces.
